ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
12 Cameras:  6*Bullet Cameras,1/3" SONY CCD Camera, 540TV Lines, 3.6mm Lens, Low 0 Lux, InfraRed LED 36 Pcs, Projected Distance Up To 98 Feet, Vandal proof & water proof;; 6*Dome Cameras, indoor, 1/3" SONY CCD, 600 TV lines, 36 IR LEDs, Vari-Focal 3.5~8mm Lens, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu, Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on).
16 Channel DVR with 2TB HDD: H.264 960H & D1, 960×480 & 30FPS Real time, 4CH D1 + 12CH CIF Recroding, 16 CH Playback, Supports HDMI & VGA Outputs, 2 USB ports for data backup & mouse operation.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Real-Time Recording 16CH Playback, 12 SONY CCD Cameras(6 Dome & 6 Bullet), iPhone Android Viewable
